variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies
Deals Physical DMG equal to 210% of ATK to all enemies
Deals Physical DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies
Deals Physical DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies
Deals Physical DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies
Deals Physical DMG equal to 180% of ATK to a single target, stuns them for 0.5s and increases the damage of the next active skill by 70%.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 210% of ATK to a single target, stuns them for 0.5s and increases the damage of the next active skill by 70%.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 240% of ATK to a single target, stuns them for 0.5s and increases the damage of the next active skill by 70%.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 270% of ATK to a single target, stuns them for 0.5s and increases the damage of the next active skill by 70%.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 300% of ATK to a single target, stuns them for 0.5s and increases the damage of the next active skill by 70%.
When in combat, the firstly-used skill deals 50% more damage.
When in combat, the firstly-used skill deals 100% more damage.
